root: ^Hey there..! I see you're ready to go live soon.
^I look forward to streaming with you.
^How are you feeling now that it's almost time

two: ^I'd hate to think you were struggling to adjust.
^Thank you Yun, I'm glad you're with me
three: ^Haha.. yeah, i decided to play a rage game for my first stream..
^the stress got to me pretty quickly..
^ so don't let Yun play rage games..
five: ^You both introduce your streams, the chat is running wild.
^You can see it by pressing the left arrow key.
^The middle screen has your stream and all your planned games.
^You can see this by pressing the forward arrow key.
^Your collab partner sits on your right screen.
^Hit the right arrow key to return to them.
six: ^Great job so far! its seems the chat likes you!
^i mean of course they do, how could they not :)
^So what would you like to do?
^ well i had some games planned but..
^ I am doing great but I don't think you're
eight: ^w-wait what do you mean? have i upset you?
nine: ^Yun has left.. please press ESC to retry..
seven: ^Hey! I won't break my monitor again I promise..
^Not with you sitting on it! I could never..
^ I hope you keep your promises!
ten: ^Of course I will! I would never lie!
^Well would you mind setting the game up?
^By going to your Middle Monitor with the forward arrow key?
